name: Bloody!
description:
-- BLOODY --

Bloody is a trippy game about a cat trying to escape a vet using it's eye lasers and powering up by eating pills made for #badboxart2017 over on gamejolt.

Its an experiment in procedural level generation and I guess trippy visuals.

--CONTROLS--

  • W, A, S, D - To move
  • Arrows - To shoot
  • Enter - To start

Thanks to

Northern Lights by Kamikaze Deadboy

and

P.Mantium by Lately Kind of Yeah

for the music for the game.
